keyPolicies.policyDescription: Louise Haigh is committed to addressing the Tories' policy impacts, including fracking, health sector cuts, and support for EU citizens.

mentions.candidate: Only Louise Haigh can stop the Tories and UKIP.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: The Tories called an election because they couldn't get their divisive agenda through Parliament.
mentions.tacticalSituation: The Lib Dems came fourth here in 2015. A vote for the Lib Dems risks letting in a weak Tory cheerleader for Theresa May and the hardest Brexit.

issues.brexitEurope: Spoke out against a divisive Tory Brexit which uses EU citizens living here and UK citizens living abroad as bargaining chips and threatens cherished workers rights.
issues.economy: Exposed the Tory funding cuts hitting every school in Sheffield.
issues.education: Force through school funding cuts hitting places like Sheffield, leaving schools with no choice but to axe teachers.
issues.environment: Fought against fracking on our treasured green spaces.
issues.health: Worsen the crisis in our NHS, forcing the growing local GP and ambulance crisis to deepen.
issues.immigration: Demanded they protect the rights of EU citizens living and working in the UK.
issues.lawCrime: As a former Special Constable, demanded our police are given the resources they need to fight crime and anti-social behavior.
issues.socialWelfare: Forced them to reinstate the vital tax credits of thousands of hard working families after the Tories shamefully and wrongly stopped them without notice.

community.content: Gave away the pay rise all MPs received to local good causes and community groups.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have never been afraid to stand up for the community I grew up in.

images.caption: Louise Haigh is standing up to the Tories
A strong independent minded local MP

examples: The Lib Dems came fourth here in 2015.
Forced them to reinstate the vital tax credits of thousands of hard working families after the Tories shamefully and wrongly stopped them without notice.
Only Louise Haigh can stop the Tories and UKIP.
A strong independent minded local MP who fights hard for Sheffield.
Fought against fracking on our treasured green spaces.
Exposed the Tory funding cuts hitting every school in Sheffield.
Gave away the pay rise all MPs received to local good causes and community groups.
A strong independent minded local MP who fights hard for Sheffield.
Spoke out against a divisive Tory Brexit which uses EU citizens living here and UK citizens living abroad as bargaining chips and threatens cherished workers rights.
Demanded they protect the rights of EU citizens living and working in the UK.
Worsen the crisis in our NHS, forcing the growing local GP and ambulance crisis to deepen.
Force through the hardest Brexit causing local jobs and businesses dear and putting up the cost of living.
Reintroduce grammar schools so only the privileged get a good education.
Force through school funding cuts hitting places like Sheffield, leaving schools with no choice but to axe teachers.
Force through school funding cuts hitting places like Sheffield, leaving schools with no choice but to axe teachers.
Force through the hardest Brexit causing local jobs and businesses dear and putting up the cost of living.
The Tories called an election because they couldn't get their divisive agenda through Parliament.
A vote for the Lib Dems risks letting in a weak Tory cheerleader.

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: I have never been afraid to stand up for the community I grew up in.
